Then what about doing this?

# Download the mkl files with tbb
curl -k https://s3.amazonaws.com/ossci-windows/mkl_2018.2.185.7z --output mkl.7z
# Extract the files from the 7z package into the directory mkl
7z x -aoa mkl.7z -omkl
# Set essential flags
set CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=%cd%\\mkl\\include
set LIB=%cd%\\mkl\\lib;%LIB

It is the steps we used to build the official one in Windows CI.

body:
Then what about doing this?
```Powershell
# Download the mkl files with tbb
curl -k https://s3.amazonaws.com/ossci-windows/mkl_2018.2.185.7z --output mkl.7z
# Extract the files from the 7z package into the directory mkl
7z x -aoa mkl.7z -omkl
# Set essential flags
set CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=%cd%\\mkl\\include
set LIB=%cd%\\mkl\\lib;%LIB
```
It is the steps we used to build the official one in Windows CI.
